items.text: the full delivery is pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: shorter towards the stumps now and Nicholls goes deep in the crease to punch it to long-on. Brings up the team's 100
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: was that a chance? It turned past Guptill's pads into the keeper's gloves, popped out of them and there seemed to be some noise, could be of the bat. Not a wide signalled so could have been a chance
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: starts with a low full toss and it's worked to leg for one
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.preText: HotSpot says there was a faint edge on the last ball of the previous evoer
items.text: works the fullish delivery to the leg side
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: tossed up, driven down to long-off easily
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: a lot of room on off tempts Nicholls who cuts the ball to short third man. A bit of fumble but they don't want to risk a single
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: pretty full and it's worked towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: goes on the back foot and defends the ball back
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: pushes the full delivery back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: makes some room and drives the ball to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: oh, that's a strange dismissal and Nicholls has softly dragged one back onto the stumps. He stepped out to push the ball before it could turn but the ball took an edge, deflected off the pads and then rolled back to hit the stumps. The opening stand of 103 is broken
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, OUT

dismissal.text: HM Nicholls  b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 53 (94m 80b 5x4 0x6) SR: 66.25

items.preText: The captain at No. 3, a slip for him as Mehidy goes around the wicket
items.text: well on the leg side, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: touch shorter on the leg side and it's steered to square leg again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: darts this one straighter and Williamson blocks. Thats' a wicket maiden
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: towards the pads and Guptill drives to long-on
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: tosses it up outside off, he drives it to cover
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: drifting in towards off now, he blocks it back
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: gets off the mark with such a risky single! He flicked the ball to leg where midwicket put in a dive to his left and the ball deflected off him to make Williamson want a single and the fielder got to the ball again quickly to his left but couldn't manage a direct hit
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: the shorter delivery is pushed down to long on and that's Guptill's 35th ODI fifty. Good innings for him after those low scores against India
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: charges down to get to the pitch of the ball and lofts that away to the long-on boundary to collect four runs
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Williamson, FOUR runs

items.text: pretty wide outside off, Guptill chases with hard hands and slashes that wide of extra cover's left, right in the gap for four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: clips this ball with the turn to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: shorter delivery on the pads, worked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: bit slower around off and he defends it back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run
